product_name: Fisher Space Pen Bullet Grip Space Pen with Stylus
long_description: The Fisher Space Pen Bullet Grip Stylus pen has a pressurized ink cartridge that allows you to write nearly anywhere and now has a stylus to work with touch screens. Replaceable pressurized ink cartridge continuously feeds ink to the tungsten carbide ball, allowing pen to write at any angle, even upside down. Visco-elastic ink writes smoothly and dependably on most surfaces, even under water, over fingerprints, in freezing cold, extreme heat and in space! Stainless-steel, precision-machined socket prevents leaks and oozing, yet delivers uniform ink flow. Ink inside the pen will not dry out before 100 years. Capacitive stylus works with all smartphones, tablets and other touch screens.
short_description: The Fisher Space Pen Bullet Grip Stylus pen has a pressurized ink cartridge that allows you to write nearly anywhere and now has a stylus to work with touch screens.
